Class DoubleRaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.eandb.jmist.framework.color.DoubleRaster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Raster, RasterWriter, Serializable

    public abstract class DoubleRaster
extends Object
implements Raster
    A Raster backed by an array of doubles.
    Author:
    Brad Kimmel
